roleset.name: mix, combine
roleset.note: MIX-V NOTES: Watch out for many many adjectival usages: "Stock prices were mixed"which don't follow this argument structure at all. Leave these alonefor the time being. (from mix.01-v)
MIXING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from mixing.01-n)

example.name: mix-v: merged ingredients
example.text: Workers dumped large burlap sacks of the imported material into a huge bin, poured in cotton and acetate fibers and mechanically mixed the dry fibers in a process used to make filters.
example.arg: in a process used to make filters

example.name: mix-v: split ingredients, end product
example.text: Ammonium perchlorate is an oxidizer that *trace*-1 is mixed *trace*-1 with a propellant to make rocket fuel used in the space shuttle and military rockets.
example.arg: to make rocket fuel used in the space shuttle and military rockets

example.name: mix-v: ergative!
example.text: Because despite all the media prattle about comedy and politics not mixing, they are similar in one respect: Both can serve as mechanisms for easing tensions and facilitating the co-existence of groups in conflict.

example.name: mix-v: distinguishing figure and ground
example.text: John mixed sand into the Jello.

example.name: mixing-n
example.text: the effect of his mixing the two beers was to lower the strength of Barclay's beer by about 2 per cent, of proof spirit.

roleset.name: phrasal mix, combine
roleset.note: MIX_UP-V NOTES: The same as mix.01, except args 2 and 3 probably will not appear. Verb particle construction is not included in mix VN class. (from mix.02-v)

example.name: mix_up-v
example.text: He mixed up some flour, eggs, oil and spices, added a big dollop of plain yogurt
example.arg: some flour, eggs, oil and spices

roleset.name: confuse
roleset.note: MIX_UP-V NOTES: The same as mix.01, except args 2 and 3 probably will not appear. Verb particle construction is not included in mix VN class. (from mix.02-v)

example.name: mix_up-v
example.text: I found that he allowed the monthly payment of his salary to go to the credit of his account, and in drawing upon that he mixed up the accounts
